visual.name: WeWrite-Matrix
visual.description: Writeback and planning in your favorite analytics tool has never been easier!

weWriteService.description: If enabled, extend writeback to WeWriteService. Make sure you connect the visuals via Id.

id.description: If WeWriteService extension enabled, use ID to create a visual group solution.

textDecoration.description: Specifies the text decoration for the text.

headerTextColor.description: Specifies the color for the headers text.

textColor.description: Specifies the color for the text.
